pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, January 6, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit a grade 10 and grade 12 online class at Humberside Collegiate Institute in Toronto, Ontario, with Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada Arif Virani.

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with the CEO and youth members of the Boys and Girls Clubs of Greater Halifax, with Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Andy Fillmore.

Closed to media.

Media appearance

3:20 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on News 1130 Vancouver.
